website_summaries.verdict: Designed to fit most 80-millimeter scopes, this case is intended to provide protection all the time, even during use. Keep in mind, though, that the cutouts won't line up for optimal use with all scope models.
pros: Fits spotting scopes of up to 80 millimeters
External gear grippers let you attach tripod to the case
Includes wraparound handles and shoulder strap
Sling on bottom for larger tripod
cons: The generic cutouts may not fit all 80-millimeter scopes at the places they work best for use

customer_reviews.title: It Will Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty nice, and exactly as advertised. I must say though, that I was a little disappointed with the choices available for Scope cases. someone moulded the inside of this case for a particular scope (not mine, that's for sure), but it's marketed as if it's universal. It is, if the only criteria for satisfaction are that the length and width are sufficient for closure. The padding works against this aim instead of for it. Something a little more customizable would have been much better. All in all though, I'm satisfied. I knew what I was was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Sebuka68

customer_reviews.title: What a perfect case for my 80mm Swarovski scope
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect case for my 80mm Swarovski scope. It's the older model that has a very large square body. At first I thought it was too large for this case but after overnight the foam has molded itself to the contours of the foam. The tripod straps are not real useful for carrying a tripod but they fit perfectly on the grab rails of my motorcycle. That might not help a lot of folks but it does make it easy to secure in a trunk or boat?? Great quality and strong zippers. This is a deal and a great safe way to store and transport your 80mm scope.
customer_reviews.author: Toad S. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but did not fit my spotting scope
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large (fits up to 80mm). It did not fit my Celestron Ultima 80 20 to 60x80 Straight Spotting Scope ( The scope is too long for this case with the eye piece installed. I returned this item. If it would have fit, I would have been very happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Sugfit Spotting Scope Case
customer_reviews.text: fits my leupold sx-2 80mm spotter like a glove and straps allow tripod to be carried below. don't know dependability, but initial impressions are positive. appears well made and price is quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is tight which I do not mind because I want the added assurance of good protection. It is well padded, has strong zippers and a reasonably strong carry strap. The built in snap harness for my tripod is an excellent design feature and makes this out to be a well thought out and functional case for my spotting scope.
customer_reviews.author: Hoypalloy

customer_reviews.title: Build quality appears good. Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Cabelas 20-82x spotting scope made by Meopta. Build quality appears good. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with the case as I also bought the scope
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He is very happy with the case as I also bought the scope.
customer_reviews.author: tkmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: My scope doesn't fit perfectly, but it fits pretty well. It is snug enough to protect my scope, and the tripod straps work perfectly. It's light and pretty compact too. Makes loading a bunch of stuff to the firing line easy.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Processor

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but just too tight for my Luepold  Ventana 20x60x80 spotting scope
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case, and although its very tight on the large end of the scope I'm going to use it, just wish it was a limitless wider to accommodate the scope without needing to really squeeze the ends together. Nice looking and holds my heavy tripod on the bottom just fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. The design is very intuitive as it allows one to also attach a tripod. I was able to fit my Zeiss Diascope Straigh 85mm/20-75x spotting scope and attach an Induro CT-014 tripod to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalJoe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a very specific fit to it. And can only use if it's a small scope!
customer_reviews.author: HBQTE

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Celestron 52250 80mm Ultima Zoom Spotting Scope
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Celestron 52250 80mm Ultima Zoom Spotting Scope or a scope with similar dimensions, allow me to save you the trouble... It does not fit. :( You can cram the scope in this case but the eye piece will push (hard) against the zipper and be prone to banging against stuff. You would not want to carry your scope this way not to mention it is a pain to get it in there even that much. Looks like a decent product otherwise. Nothing to ooh and ahh about but if there were more competitors it could easily be considered over-priced
customer_reviews.author: C is for Cookie

customer_reviews.title: per - fit  snug - fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case A nice item with a reasonable price does what it was designed to do protect you spotting scope I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brody

customer_reviews.title: good fit. arrived on time and the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: good fit. arrived on time and the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: R T Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This case is well made. I does what it was designed to do pretect you spotting scope. Should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Spotting Scope Case
customer_reviews.text: A nice item with a reasonable price. It needs to have tighter straps for tripod. Bag fits my scope and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Moore

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scope barely fits in the case, extends well beyond the molded area.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was short when you left the eye piece on. Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Vanguard Endeavor HD 82A
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with the Vanguard Endeavor HD 82A Angled Eyepiece Spotting Scope. Has good padding to protect scope. The only negative is the tripod straps can't be tucked away or removed.
customer_reviews.author: Abysal

product_meta.title: Sportsman's Outdoor Products Snugfit Spotting Scope Case Fits Up to 80-mm (Black)
feature_bullets: Item Package Dimensions: 54.61 L X 33.528 W X 13.97 H (Cm)
